sentences.en: Application of work visa, work permit and house lease for expatriate staff.

sentences.en: He is content to remain an expatriate the rest of his life.
sentences.cn: 他满足于馀生流亡于国外.

sentences.en: Job involvement has mediator effect between expatriate adjustment and job satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 工作投入在海外适应性与工作满意度之间有中介效果.

sentences.en: Only tenure positively influenced expatriates'adjustment while other demographic variables main effects on expatriate adjustment.
sentences.cn: 结果发现当控制其他人文变数时,年资会正向影响外派人员适应性.

sentences.en: Since the storm , 21 expatriate Red Cross and Red Crescent aid workers have joined the team.
sentences.cn: 21名(缅甸)移居国外的红十字会与红新月会救援工作者也加入了救援队伍.

sentences.en: Some of them have the idea that this a short cut to a fast expatriate package.
sentences.cn: 他们当中的一些人认为,这是迅速找到外派工作的捷径.

sentences.en: Sunhome Real Estate focuses on providing professional Residential Relocation Service to the expatriate community.
sentences.cn: 中涛房产致力于为外籍人士提供专业的居住安家服务.

sentences.en: The author is an expatriate artist living in Singapore.
sentences.cn: 作者是旅居本地的艺术工作者.

sentences.en: The course is directed at the expatriate community and will be conducted mainly in English.
sentences.cn: 课程将主要集中在以英语为主的国外人士社区或团体开设.

sentences.en: The expatriate vote could help determine who wins in November.
sentences.cn: 侨居者们的投票有助于决定谁在11月获胜。

sentences.en: The writer is expatriate artist living in Singapore.
sentences.cn: 作者是旅居本地的艺术工作者.叶琦保译.

sentences.en: This paper develops a practical approach for the selection of expatriate managers and discusses expatriate - training.
sentences.cn: 本文针对跨国公司外派经理的选择问题,给出了一种实用的决策分析方法;并讨论了外派经理开发机制.
